name: BalDepositor
description: BalDepositor contract. Deposit contract for Prime Pools is based on the convex contract crvDepositor.sol.

eventDecorators.name: FeeManagerChanged
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: LockIncentiveChanged
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

functionDecorators.name: burnD2DBal
functionDecorators.description: Burns D2DBal from some address. Only Controller can call this.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Locks initial balance of Weth/Bal in Voter Proxy. Then stakes `_amount` of Weth/Bal tokens to veBal contract Mints & stakes d2dBal in Rewards contract on behalf of caller. VoterProxy `staker` is responsible for sending Weth/Bal tokens to veBal contract via _locktoken() All of the minted d2dBal will be automatically staked to the Rewards contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of tokens user wants to stake.

parameterDecorators.name: _lock
parameterDecorators.description: boolean whether depositor wants to lock funds immediately.

functionDecorators.name: depositAll
functionDecorators.description: Deposits entire Weth/Bal balance of caller. Stakes same amount in Rewards contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _lock
parameterDecorators.description: boolean whether depositor wants to lock funds immediately.

functionDecorators.name: initialLock
functionDecorators.description: Locks initial Weth/Bal balance in veBal contract via voterProxy contract.

functionDecorators.name: lockBalancer
functionDecorators.description: Locks tokens in vBal contract and mints reward tokens to sender. Needed in order to lockFunds on behalf of someone else.

parameterDecorators.name: _feeManager
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the fee manager.
